data.eml:eml: Report on some caridean shrimps (Crustacea: Decapoda) from Mayotte, southwest Indian Ocean

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Xinzheng, Cleva, Régis, Poupin, Joseph (2012): Report on some caridean shrimps (Crustacea: Decapoda) from Mayotte, southwest Indian Ocean. Zootaxa 3162: 1-30, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.246311
